name.description: A short and unique name which will represent the name of the set of queries in DHIS2

section.description: A name which can be used to group related queries.

section_order.description: A number which can be used to order queries within sections

summary_uid.description: A DHIS2 uid used to identify the summary query

summary_sql.description: An SQL query which should return a single line and consist of four character fields: indicator,value,percent and description

details_uid.description: A DHIS2 uid used to identify the details query

details_sql.description: A DHIS2 database query which should return all identified objects from this particular issue. Should return at least uid and name

details_id_type.description: A short string which identifies the section of the details SQL.

severity.description: Level of severity of the issue

introduction.description: This should field describe the issue the queries are seeking to identify.

recommendation.description: This field should describe the procedure to rectify the problems

is_protected.description: Flag to indicate whether the query accesses protected tables. These queries cannot be accessed via the API

is_slow.description: Flag to indicate whether the query has the potential to take a long time to execute. By default, these will be excluded.
